- More than Food -

Not Just A Bowl is a casual ramen restaurant kitchen and bar serving authentic ramen dishes at the center of Times Square, within the Theater District of New York City. A wide selection of fresh craft cocktails coupled with a variety of menu items provides for a unique, delicious dining experience you will not want to miss!

Monday - Saturday
10:00a - 9:00p

245 W 44th St
New York, NY 10036
